Text.val: Author: Jerry Janssens
Creation date: AUG 2002
01.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
01.10.2009 GB SCR14945 Extended condition of selection
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
09.12.2007 GB SCR13086 Changed way of creating receivers' letters email
24.10.2007 SH SCR13029 Changed ACCC_MUTTYPE < 96 to where clause sums ACCC
03.09.2007 SH SCR12876 Changed GM102.PI.SUBJECT = 'Difference CMON - ACCC'
10.08.2007 SH SCR12793 Added GM102 to send email in case of differences found
13.06.2007 SH SCR12490 Added test on DBHS (changes on CLNT108_ACC_CURR) to skip
test which turns BMN531 to MSGW
10.01.2007 SH SCR12218 Job turns now to MSGW is at least one difference exists
at the end of "ProcessCMON"
07.03.2003 JJ req JDO added parameters for Year and month
21.10.2002 JJ SCR2392 Added messages for non-matching CMON fields
10.09.2002 JJ added ACCC_MUTTYPE < 98 to where clause sums ACCC
Program checks CMON against the first ACCT of the active month + sums of ACCC
-- Check if CLNT108_ACC_CURR is changed in this month
-- If at least one difference exists inform the users via email

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum(ACCC_MUTADEBTORS) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum(ACCC_MUTARESERVE) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum(ACCC_MUTAINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum(ACCC_MUTAFACTORING) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum(ACCC_MUTASETTLEMENT) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum(ACCC_MUTARETENTION) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum(ACCC_MUTADISPUTES) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum(ACCC_MUTASPECIAL) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum(ACCC_MUTAEXTRAFIN) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum(ACCC_MUTAPAYMENTSETTLE) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum(ACCC_MUTAARRANGEMENTS) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum(ACCC_MUTASTOCK) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/ACCC where ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and ACCC_ACCT_DATE between ':4' and ':5' and ACCC_MUTTYPE < 96

Text.val: -- If CLNT108_ACC_CURR is changed in this month, then it's not a differenecs
why BMN531 has to go to MSGW at the end

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Difference found by BMN531 , please check jobjournal')

Text.val: -- If year/month parameters not provided take from GNRL
